value.title: Search Bar in Power BI Slicer
value.excerpt: If you have too many items in a slicer, such as the list of customer names, or product names, then finding one amongst the list takes time, unless you enable the search. Fortunately, the search is there for you, you just need to enable it, In this very short article and video, Iâ€™ll explain where it is

value.title: Creating real time dashboards in Power BI with push datasets
value.excerpt: Though you can build real-time reports with DirectQuery, push datasets offer a more scalable, economical, and effective solution especially when combined with an Import model already in place. This video introduces the architecture of push datasets. Article and download: https://www.sqlbi.com/?p=729917&aff=yt

value.title: Specifying multiple filter conditions in CALCULATE
value.excerpt: The filter arguments in CALCULATE can reference multiple columns from the same table in a single predicate: This is possible since March 2021 in Power BI, before that it was possible to filter a single column reference.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/705207?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt

value.title: Understanding context transition
value.excerpt: Context transition is one of the most obscure topics for DAX newbies. Learn how it works, its effects, and how to leverage it rather than be scared of it. Article and download: https://sql.bi/751407?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

topItems.title: How to Use CALCULATE in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: This is one of the most import function to master in Power BI. You can filter your data and create complex measure such as year over year comparisons with ease with these easy to follow tutorial. More more help this function.

value.title: Embed Power BI
value.excerpt: The ability to embed Power BI into your site or application. This list has videos that are related to the different embedding options for Power BI. This includes Publish to web, the REST APIs and the Power BI Embedded Azure service.

topItems.title: Deep dive on how to create Power BI themes with a JSON file
topItems.excerpt: You can customize the look and feel of the Power BI reports using the formatting pane for each specific visual or you can speed up the process by using a JSON file.  This feature (the JSON file) has been available for quite a while but on the September 2017 update of Power BI Desktop, they allow us to

topItems.title: Reviewing the JSON editor - Power BI desktop update december 2019

topItems.title: Convert JSON strings to tables in Power Query/ Power BI
topItems.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to convert JSON files in Power Query to a table easily, in basically 2 steps!!  Some additional resources: Meetup: https://www.meetup.com/preview/Sweden-Power-BI-User-Group/events/242804557  Import Json files from Erik: https://eriksvensen.wordpress.com/2014/09/15/specifying-json-query-in-power-query-example-statistics-sweden/

value.title: Power BI and PowerShell

topItems.title: Get Started with Power BI PowerShell | Install PowerShell Cmdlets for Power BI
topItems.excerpt: In this session, we will talk about how we can get started with the Power BI PowerShell. For any organization, if we wish to perform some admin related tasks easily and in faster manner, PowerShell is the best option. So many operations we can perform very easily and faster. topItems.title: How to Publish Power BI Report using PowerShell Cmdlet | Publish Power BI report using PowerShell
topItems.excerpt: During this video we will learn, how we can easily publish our Power BI report using PowerShell command. topItems.title: Download Power BI Report File Using Windows PowerShell | PowerShell to Export Power BI Report File

topItems.title: Get List of All Workspaces as an Admin Using Windows PowerShell | PowerShell and Power BI
topItems.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can get the list of All the available Workspaces in Power BI tenant. Power BI provides PowerShell Administrator API.
